WorkItem.Description:
Hiya
 
The optional screen "show bars relative to equipped" displays a bar and a delta number. I suggest additionally displaying the value of the percent change in the overall points if the item was equipped. 
 
Make it easier to see at a glance if an item gives a significant improvement or just a marginal one. Thanks for considering and thanks very much for Rawr.
WorkItem.Summary: Feature Request:Display a percent change by each item
